description: The AP_CLAIM_MISC_BOX table contains the miscellaneous box information on an accounts payable claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line position in the claim's misc box related items for the current row.

columns.name: MISC_BOX_IDENTITY
columns.description: The ID of the miscellaneous box entry.

columns.name: MISC_BOX_ENTRY
columns.description: The miscellaneous entry for the claim.
